txt.en: By the breath of Hrímil Frost-heart, the gates of Gundabad were sealed shut. If the Dwarves of the Gabil'akkâ intend to enter the sacred mountain, they shall first have to overcome the towering wall of ice that separates them from their prize.
Defeat the Frost-horde at Mount Gundabad ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
A few small fragments break loose, but the ice resists your efforts
Attempt to breach the ice sealing Mount Gundabad ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'You have done enough for now, [placeholder]! Let us leave this place before the Frost-horde overruns us!'
Defeated the Frost-horde at Mount Gundabad ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Your mission is to repel the Frost-horde and attempt to breach the ice sealing the gates of Mount Gundabad.
